description: A copycat implementation of Arc'teryx product pages, using React & css to mimic the look and feel of a professional website.
author: Amanda Post [Front-End] | Kristina Taing [Back-End]

scripts.seed:sql: npm run seed-product:sql; npm run seed-image:sql; npm run seed-size:sql
scripts.seed-product:sql: psql -d product -U username -c "\copy products FROM 'product-data.csv' delimiter '|' csv header;"
scripts.seed-image:sql: psql -d product -U username -c "\copy images(product_id, colors, urls, thumbnails) FROM 'image-data.csv' delimiter '|' csv header;"
scripts.seed-size:sql: psql -d product -U username -c "\copy sizes(product_id, size, in_stock) FROM 'size-data.csv' delimiter '|' csv header;"
